mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') as DAY, COUNT(A.USER_KEY) as USER_COUNT FROM T_USER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTHORITY IN (10, 19) AND TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') = #{year} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY DAY ASC
SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') as DAY, COUNT(A.USER_KEY) as USER_COUNT FROM T_USER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTHORITY IN (10, 19) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') ORDER BY DAY ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAY, COUNT(A.USER_KEY) as USER_COUNT FROM T_USER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTHORITY IN (10, 19) AND TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{month} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY DAY ASC
